name: TMUX Window Demo - List project directories
description: Demonstrate TMUX window creation by listing directories in the chore dispatcher project. Each chore will get its own TMUX window.

name: List chore dispatcher directory
description: Run ls -la in /Users/skippo/Development/KIRO/chore_dispatcher to show implementation files

name: List tests directory
description: Run ls -la in /Users/skippo/Development/KIRO/chore_dispatcher/tests to show test suite

name: Show chore data files
description: Run ls -la in /Users/skippo/SkipsChoreData to show active and completed chore archives

name: Implement TMUX window execution with chore-specific UNIX instructions
description: Enable each TMUX window to automatically execute the specific instructions for its chore. Generate UNIX-readable commands based on chore description and provide execution mechanism within the dedicated window.

name: Add chore instruction parsing and UNIX command generation
description: Parse chore descriptions to extract actionable UNIX commands. Create instruction templates for common chore types (list directories, run tests, build projects, etc.)

name: Implement TMUX window command execution integration
description: Modify TMUXWindowManager to execute chore-specific commands when creating windows. Add command injection and execution within the dedicated chore window.

name: Add chore instruction templates and command mapping
description: Create templates for common chore patterns: directory listing, file operations, build commands, test execution. Map chore descriptions to executable UNIX commands.

name: Implement automatic command execution on window creation
description: Automatically execute chore instructions when TMUX window is created. Provide command history and execution status within the window.

name: Add execution status monitoring and feedback
description: Monitor command execution status, capture output, and provide feedback mechanism. Update chore progress based on execution results.
